ENGLISH: This character has been recognized as the finest archer in the realm.
This character has been appointed a commander of fleets.
The Lieutenant of Angband is Morgoth's chief servant, and holds the highest authority in Dor Deadeloth beneath the Dark Lord himself.
The Heir of Morgoth is designated to continue the work of the Dark Lord if ever he falls.
This character is in charge of the distribution of slaves to the court.
Marchwardens are skilled elf warriors tasked with defending the borders of the realm.
As 'the Grand Axe of Craftsmanship', the position of Court Architect holds much prestige.
FRENCH: En tant que « Grande Hache de l'Artisanat », le poste d'Architecte de la Cour a beaucoup de prestige.
GERMAN: Als "große Axt der Handwerkskunst" bringt die Position des Hofarchitekten viel Prestige mit sich.
ITALIAN: El puesto de arquitecto de la corte, como "Gran hacha de la artesanía", tiene mucho prestigio.
